attributes.action: Take The Valleys (MTV) off Air in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
This so called entertainment show needs to be taken off air immediately and all other series need to be banned as it is an embarrassment to Wales and everyone living there.

The government needs to step in and stop this farce of a show as it detrimental to the toursim of Wales and potentially the UK along with bad expamles it is setting our younger generation.

rejection.details: Decisions relating to regulating the programmes that broadcasters produce are a matter for the independent regulator, the Office of Communication (Ofcom) and you should address your concerns and complaints to them.  It would be inappropriate for the Government to comment on, or interfere with, the rights of broadcasters.
